Sentencas: Publication of the 2010/31 EU Directive is proof of the importance of energy saving in buildings.
Titulo: Innovative household systems based on solid oxide fuel cells for the Mediterranean climate

Sentencas: European Union policies are oriented to increase the levels of energy saving, renewable energy and cogeneration, with the aim to decrease greenhouses emissions and energy dependence.
Titulo: Innovative household systems based on solid oxide fuel cells for the Mediterranean climate

Sentencas: Publication of the 2004/8/EC Directive indicates that cogeneration is considered as a solution to reach the goal of energy efficiency.
Titulo: Innovative household systems based on solid oxide fuel cells for the Mediterranean climate

Sentencas: an innovative system based on solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), an air source heat pump (ASHP), and an integration system to cover a part of the heating demand of a building.
Titulo: Innovative household systems based on solid oxide fuel cells for the Mediterranean climate

Sentencas: Two different integration systems are proposed: electric heater and condensing boiler.
Titulo: Innovative household systems based on solid oxide fuel cells for the Mediterranean climate

Sentencas: Heat storage is also considered to store waste heat when it is unused.
Titulo: Innovative household systems based on solid oxide fuel cells for the Mediterranean climate

Sentencas: An innovative parameter, the electric equivalent load, is proposed: it has the function of characterizing not only electricity consumption but also heating and cooling demands.
Titulo: Innovative household systems based on solid oxide fuel cells for the Mediterranean climate

Sentencas: The aim is to maximize efficiency while minimizing the mismatch between different forms of energy consumption.
Titulo: Innovative household systems based on solid oxide fuel cells for the Mediterranean climate

Sentencas: The proposal is to verify the energy efficiency of the system used to cover energy demands of a residential building located in a Mediterranean area (Trapani, south of Italy).
Titulo: Innovative household systems based on solid oxide fuel cells for the Mediterranean climate

Sentencas: The results of the simulations are analyzed with thermodynamics and techno-economic benchmarks, considering different economic scenarios.
Titulo: Innovative household systems based on solid oxide fuel cells for the Mediterranean climate

Sentencas: The calculations indicate a high primary energy saving and profitability for the proposed system.
Titulo: Innovative household systems based on solid oxide fuel cells for the Mediterranean climate
